title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI application.
2. Navigate to the label section.
3. Modify the font size of the label.

OB: The label height is not updated to reflect the new font size immediately after modifying it in the UI.

EB: The label height should adjust accordingly to match the new font size immediately after modifying it in the UI.

SR: 
1. Open the UI application.
2. Navigate to the label section.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change to reflect the new font size.
